arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} chance to create a {c_important}Mystic Circle{/c} for {c_number}[PowerTag.Spiritborn_RuneArea."Script Formula 5"]{/c} seconds. 

Casting a {c_important}Gorilla{/c} Skill in {c_important}Mystic Circles{/c} empowers them to periodically grant you a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life which increases your Armor by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * (1 + Owner.Bonus_Percent_Per_Power#Spiritborn_RuneArea)|%+|]{/c} while active.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} chance to create a {c_important}Mystic Circle{/c} for {c_number}[PowerTag.Spiritborn_RuneArea."Script Formula 5"]{/c} seconds. 

Casting a {c_important}Gorilla{/c} Skill in {c_important}Mystic Circles{/c} empowers them to periodically grant you a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life which increases your Armor by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * (1 + Owner.Bonus_Percent_Per_Power#Spiritborn_RuneArea)|%+|]{/c} while active.
